Hi Arnold,
He will be there.  It'll be about the same lineup as in the recent overseas shinsa in Jersey City and London.

Jim



  Hi Jim:
  Can you confirm that Hagihara sensei will still be doing the kodogu at
  Chicago? It matters a lot to me in terms of what I bring. Thank you.
  Arnold afrenzel@...
